item.title: About
item.description: Hey!, I’m Ishan I belong from Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh but I am currently settled in Bengaluru. I am currently working as a Delivery Intern at Virtusa. I have done my High School and Intermediate from Central Academy, Lucknow, with an acceptable GPA of 8.6 in High School and 77% in Intermediate. Currently, I am pursuing my 4th-year Btech from VIT-AP University, Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh with a CGPA of 8.84. I can converse in Hindi and English
